short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Apply a dark theme to Chrome.

Ever wished for a sleek and eye-friendly dark theme across all your Chrome tabs? Look no further! Introducing "Dark Theme For Chrome" ‚Äì a revolutionary extension that automatically applies a dark theme to all your browser tabs, enhancing your browsing experience in a single click.

‚ú® **Key Features:**

- **One-Click Dark Theme:** Instantly switch to a dark theme with just one click, reducing eye strain during those late-night browsing sessions.

- **Automated Dark Theme for All Tabs:** Forget manual adjustments! Our extension automatically extends the dark theme to all your open tabs, providing a consistent and seamless dark mode experience.

- **Easy Customization:** Tailor the dark theme to your preferences with easy-to-use customization options. Adjust background colors, text, and more for a personalized touch.
